description:
This market refers to the tennis match between Pedro Martinez and Novak Djokovic in the Australian Open ATP, scheduled for January 18 2026.
This market will resolve to "Over" if the total number of games completed across all sets equals or exceeds 41. Otherwise, it will resolve to "Under."
All tiebreaks—including any Champions/Super tiebreak—count as one (1) game toward the total.
If the match begins but is not completed, this market will resolve 50-50. If the match is canceled before play begins or delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a result, this market will also resolve 50-50.
Resolution will be based on official Grand Slam statistics.

events.description:
This market refers on the tennis match between Pedro Martinez and Novak Djokovic in the Australian Open ATP, scheduled for January 17 at 7:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Martinez' if Pedro Martinez advances against Novak Djokovic.

This market will resolve to 'Djokovic' if Novak Djokovic advances against Pedro Martinez.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match begins but is not completed, and one player advances due to the opponent's retirement, default, or disqualification, this market will resolve to the player who advances.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the Australian Open. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
events.title: Australian Open Men's: Pedro Martinez vs Novak Djokovic
